ValidationRule.description:
Prevent the Case.New_Load_Audit_MMS003__c field from being populated when the Case is created.
New Load Audit MMS003
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISNEW(), New_Load_Audit_MMS003__c > DATEVALUE("2000-01-01"), $RecordType.Name = "Service Onboarding MMS Payroll Case Former" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The New Load Audit MMS003 field can not be populated when a Case is being created. This field should only be updated after the New Load Audit has been completed.
